import React, {Component} from "react"; import { BrowserRouter, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import GameRoomNinePNG from './GameRoomNinePNG.png'; const RoomNine = (props) => { if(props.roomNineStatus === 0){ return (

This Is Room Nine

You are encountering three different shapes! Be careful and think about what you should attack first.

Enemy one is a ----, it has {props.enemyHealth} health, {props.enemyAttack} attack, {props.enemySpeed} speed, {props.enemyArmor} armor, and will reward you with {props.enemyReward} coin.

The second enemy is a ---, it has {props.enemy2Health} health, {props.enemy2Attack} attack, {props.enemy2Speed} speed, {props.enemy2Armor} armor, and will reward you with {props.enemy2Reward} coin.

The third enemy is a ---, it has {props.enemy3Health} health, {props.enemy3Attack} attack, {props.enemy3Speed} speed, {props.enemy3Armor} armor, and will reward you with {props.enemy3Reward} coin.

) } if (props.roomNineStatus === 1 ) { return(

This Is The GameBoard Room Nine

You killed all the shapes. They rewarded you with 25 (Hard Coded number, might need to change after balancing) coins total.

=
) } } export default RoomNine;
